text: "18 Days" is the second single off the 2008 album by Saving Abel called Saving Abel. The song is also on the previous self-titled album by Saving Abel. The song was released in late 2008 when it took major airplay. ==Charts== "18 Days" by Saving Abel reached 14 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Modern Rock Tracks. The single also peaked at #8 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Mainstream Rock Tracks. Category:2008 songs
title: 18 Days
